Base class to create a real-time game server using FastAPI and WebSocket.

Send the current game state to all clients.

Trigger a state update for all connected clients.

get_chat_with_colors(chat_history: list, player_names: dict) → list[source]¶

Adds a color key to chat messages based on player IDs. Supports any number of players and highlights the GAME referee.
